name: Gloren
description:
Gloren is a PC first person shooter, developed by a group of indie game developers "AK Games". We have put all our efforts to make the game look more effective.  

Story:

            A young and enthusiastic Soldier is after an underworld Mafia boss "Black Papa" who is mainly involved in drug's smuggling. This is a difficult task for him as he has to make him weaken first and then kill him.

The player has to pass from stages and levels to reach the Drug Lord.

Versions: 

                    This is the first version of the game as this is our very first game and we promise to upload more games in the future too. You can also ask for changes in the comment for the nest versions.

How to install:

As the game is in .7z format so you will need winrar or 7zip to extract it.
